CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 26, 1959, pg. A16 reads: Plan Scholarship Benefit - This lovely group, representing the Pittsburgh Scholarship Guild, is making final plans for a supper dance which the Guild will sponsor at Hotel Sherwyn, Oct. 9, at 7:30 P.M. Left to right: Mmes. Madelyn Hairston, chairman; Yola Kemp, Elizabeth Giddens, Edna Britton, Norma Malone and Francis Cook, standing. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pittsburgh Scholarship Guild members, from left: Madelyn Hairston, Yola Kemp, Elizabeth Giddens, Francis Cook, standing; Edna Britton, and Norma Malone, gathered in interior with wooden coffee table with magazines and objects, plant, and brick wall, another version
